attempts.output_sql:
SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a, customer AS c, store_sales AS s, date_dim AS d, item AS i
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
  AND s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
  AND d.d_year = 2002
  AND d.d_moy = 3
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * (
    SELECT
      AVG(j.i_current_price)
    FROM item AS j
    WHERE
      j.i_category = i.i_category
  )
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a, customer AS c, store_sales AS s, date_dim AS d, item AS i, precomputed_agg AS pa
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
  AND s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
  AND d.d_year = 2002
  AND d.d_moy = 3
  AND i.i_category = pa.i_category
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * pa.avg_price
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

WITH filtered_dates AS (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3
)
SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a, customer AS c, store_sales AS s, filtered_dates AS d, item AS i
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
  AND s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * (
    SELECT
      AVG(j.i_current_price)
    FROM item AS j
    WHERE
      j.i_category = i.i_category
  )
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  state,
  cnt
FROM combined_cte
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  state
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a
JOIN customer AS c
  ON a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
JOIN store_sales AS s
  ON c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
JOIN date_dim AS d
  ON s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
JOIN item AS i
  ON s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
CROSS JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    d_month_seq
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3
) AS month_seq
WHERE
  d.d_month_seq = month_seq.d_month_seq
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * (
    SELECT
      AVG(j.i_current_price) OVER (PARTITION BY j.i_category)
    FROM item AS j
    WHERE
      j.i_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
    LIMIT 1
  )
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM date_dim AS d, store_sales AS s, item AS i, customer AS c, customer_address AS a
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
  AND s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
  AND d.d_month_seq = (
    SELECT DISTINCT
      (
        d_month_seq
      )
    FROM date_dim
    WHERE
      d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3
  )
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * (
    SELECT
      AVG(j.i_current_price)
    FROM item AS j
    WHERE
      j.i_category = i.i_category
  )
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

WITH date_dim_combined AS (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk,
    d_month_seq,
    CASE WHEN d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3 THEN d_month_seq END AS target_month_seq
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3
), date_dim_filtered AS (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk,
    d_month_seq,
    MAX(target_month_seq) AS target_month_seq
  FROM date_dim_combined
  GROUP BY
    d_date_sk,
    d_month_seq
)
SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a
JOIN customer AS c
  ON a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
JOIN store_sales AS s
  ON c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
JOIN date_dim_filtered AS d
  ON s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
JOIN item AS i
  ON s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
WHERE
  d.d_month_seq = d.target_month_seq
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * (
    SELECT
      AVG(j.i_current_price)
    FROM item AS j
    WHERE
      j.i_category = i.i_category
  )
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

WITH date_dim_combined AS (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk,
    d_month_seq,
    CASE WHEN d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3 THEN d_month_seq END AS target_month_seq
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_year = 2002
    AND d_moy = 3
    AND d_month_seq = (
      CASE WHEN d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3 THEN d_month_seq END
    )
), date_dim_filtered AS (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk,
    d_month_seq,
    MAX(target_month_seq) AS target_month_seq
  FROM date_dim_combined
  WHERE
    d_month_seq = target_month_seq
  GROUP BY
    d_date_sk,
    d_month_seq
)
SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a
JOIN customer AS c
  ON a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
JOIN store_sales AS s
  ON c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
JOIN date_dim_filtered AS d
  ON s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
JOIN item AS i
  ON s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
WHERE
  d.d_month_seq = d.target_month_seq
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * (
    SELECT
      AVG(j.i_current_price)
    FROM item AS j
    WHERE
      j.i_category = i.i_category
  )
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

WITH month_seq_cte AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    d_month_seq
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3
)
SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a, customer AS c, store_sales AS s, date_dim AS d, item AS i
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
  AND s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
  AND d.d_month_seq = (
    SELECT
      d_month_seq
    FROM month_seq_cte
  )
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * (
    SELECT
      AVG(j.i_current_price)
    FROM item AS j
    WHERE
      j.i_category = i.i_category
  )
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a, customer AS c, store_sales AS s, date_dim AS d, item AS i
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk

  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
  AND d.d_month_seq = (
    SELECT DISTINCT
      d_month_seq

  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * (

GROUP BY

WITH category_avg AS (
  SELECT
    j.i_category AS category,
    AVG(j.i_current_price) AS avg_price
  FROM item AS j
  GROUP BY
    j.i_category
), month_seq AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    (
      d_month_seq
    )
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3
)
SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a, customer AS c, store_sales AS s, date_dim AS d, item AS i, category_avg AS ca, month_seq AS ms
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
  AND s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
  AND d.d_month_seq = ms.d_month_seq
  AND i.i_category = ca.category
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * ca.avg_price
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

WITH category_avg AS (
  SELECT
    j.i_category AS category,
    AVG(j.i_current_price) AS avg_price
  FROM item AS j
  GROUP BY
    j.i_category
), filtered_dates AS (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk,
    d_month_seq
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3
)
SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a, customer AS c, store_sales AS s, filtered_dates AS d, item AS i, category_avg AS ca
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
  AND s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
  AND i.i_category = ca.category
  AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * ca.avg_price
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

WITH category_avg AS (
  SELECT
    j.i_category AS category,
    AVG(j.i_current_price) AS avg_price
  FROM item AS j
  GROUP BY
    j.i_category
), filtered_dates AS (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk,
    d_month_seq
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_year = 2002 AND d_moy = 3
)
SELECT
  a.ca_state AS state,
  COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM customer_address AS a, customer AS c, store_sales AS s, filtered_dates AS d, (
  SELECT
    i.*,
    ca.avg_price
  FROM item AS i, category_avg AS ca
  WHERE
    i.i_category = ca.category AND i.i_current_price > 1.2 * ca.avg_price
) AS i
WHERE
  a.ca_address_sk = c.c_current_addr_sk
  AND c.c_customer_sk = s.ss_customer_sk
  AND s.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk
  AND s.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
GROUP BY
  a.ca_state
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 10
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  a.ca_state
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  state,
  cnt
FROM combined_cte
ORDER BY
  cnt,
  state
LIMIT 100
